name: Dutch Shuffleboard
description:
Dutch shuffleboard is based on the traditional game from the Netherlands. The goal is to slide wooden pucks into scoring boxes. You’ll get a big fat bonus when you score a puck in each box! Dutch shuffleboard is child friendly and fun for the whole family.

Parental Advice:
Dutch shuffleboard is a game for the whole family. Please note that some of the advertisements might not be suitable for very young children. The paid version of Dutch shuffleboard contains no advertisements.
